Content: Is it too late to register an eth address?
I didn’t suggest they shouldn’t be compensated….. I only suggest IMO it should NOT be with community points associated with a crypto conversations they’re responsible for moderating
Honestly, the fact moderators are able to collect monetary community points (in whatever fashion) is IMO always going to cause suspicious and potential conflicts of interest.

And I wonder why SEC wants a piece. 

Every other asshole in the world does, why not them.
